TimeSensitiveLogic.writeIndex: Uses `now` to timestamp each entry, making event data creation time-sensitive.

ConditionalLogicPaths.Ownership Condition: Requires `msg.sender == owner` to proceed with `changeOwner`, `execute`, and other owner-only functions.
ConditionalLogicPaths.Acceptance Condition: Requires `msg.sender == newOwner` in `acceptOwnership` to finalize ownership transfer.
